mapper.select: select count(*) from user INNER JOIN user_role ON user.id = user_role.uid where user_role.rId=4
select count(*) from demand_order where status = 4
select sum(coalNumber) from demand_order where status = 4

select table2.RecentlytotallPrice/table2.totallPrice from ( select sum(q.rawCoalPrice * q.supplyQuantity) as RecentlytotallPrice,(select sum(q.rawCoalPrice * q.supplyQuantity) as totallPrice from quoted_price_info as q inner join demand_order as d on q.did = d.id where q.status = 3 group by q.status) as totallPrice from quoted_price_info as q inner join demand_order as d on q.did = d.id where q.status = 3 and d.deliveryTime between '2020-09-15 00:00:00' and '2020-09-25 00:00:00' group by q.status ) as table2
select count(*) from quoted_price_info where status = 3

SELECT demand_order.coalType, sum( demand_order.coalNumber ) AS gdp, DATE_FORMAT( demand_order.deliveryTime, "%Y" ) AS `year` FROM demand_order GROUP BY demand_order.coalType, DATE_FORMAT( demand_order.deliveryTime, "%Y" )
select coalType from demand_order where deliveryTime >= #{beginYear} and deliveryTime < #{endYear} group by coalType
select count(*) from demand_order where coalType = #{coalType}
SELECT demand_order.transportType, count(*) as count FROM demand_order GROUP BY demand_order.transportType

select coalType,producingArea,sum(supplyQuantity) as count from (select d.coalType,q.producingArea,q.supplyQuantity from quoted_price_info as q inner join demand_order as d on q.did = d.id where q.producingArea = '沿海城市' or q.producingArea = '内陆城市' group by q.producingArea,q.id) as table1 group by producingArea,coalType

select coalType,producingArea,sum(supplyQuantity) as count from (select d.coalType,q.producingArea,q.supplyQuantity from quoted_price_info as q inner join demand_order as d on q.did = d.id where q.producingArea = '沿海城市' or q.producingArea = '内陆城市' group by q.producingArea,q.id) as table1 group by producingArea,coalType
select DISTINCT q.port,d.deliveryPlace from quoted_price_info as q inner join demand_order as d on q.did = d.id
select count(*) from demand_order where applyTime <= #{sunday} and applyTime >= #{monday}
select sum(coalNumber) from demand_order where applyTime <= #{sunday} and applyTime >= #{monday}
select u.createTime from user AS u INNER JOIN user_role AS ur ON u.id = ur.uId INNER JOIN role AS r ON ur.rId = r.id where r.roleName = "阳光用户" order by createTime desc limit 1
